0.user_question: Mariah’s grandma was teaching her to knit. Mariah used 1/4 of a skein of yarn. Her grandma used 1/2 of a skein of yarn. There are 364 yards in a skein of yarn. How many yards of yarn did they use altogether?

ost_step.1: Mariah used 1/4 of a skein, so she used 364 yards / 4 = 91.
ost_step.2: Her grandma used 1/2 of a skein, so she used 364 yards / 2 = 182.
ost_step.3: Together they used 91 yards (from Mariah) + 182 yards (from her grandma) = 273 yards.
